00034 NxVec3 Departure::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00035 {
00036         
00037         NxVec3 departure;
00038         // desired velocity points away from the target
00039         NxVec3 e = aInfo->m_vTarget - aInfo->m_vPos;
00040         e = -e / e.magnitudeSquared();
00041         departure = m_fcKDeparture*e;
00042         
00043         if (departure.magnitude() > aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity)
00044         {
00045                 aInfo->m_vOrientation = departure;
00046                 aInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00047                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vOrientation *aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00048         }
00049         else
00050                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = departure;
00051 
00052         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00053         
00054 }
00055 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
